tests: INSERT INTO qa_result (run_id, assertion_id, concept_id, details)
SELECT <RUNID>, '<ASSERTIONUUID>', d.conceptid, concat('Current concept (', c.id, ') with "juvenile" or "childhood" in any term not modelled with "Occurrence " = "Childhood": ', term)
assertionText: Current concept with "juvenile" or "childhood" in any term not modelled with "Occurrence " = "Childhood"
shortName: childhood in term modelled with occurrence
docRef: SNOMED CT Style Guide: Clinical Findings Section2.12 Occurrence
